Package com.comp2042.ui

package com.comp2042.ui
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.comp2042
     
    com.comp2042.logic
     
    com.comp2042.model
     
  • Class
    Description
    AudioManager
    Manages all audio playback within the application, including background music and sound effects.
    BrickViewManager
    Manages the display and position of the active brick and its ghost.
    ControlsController
    Controller for the controls settings view.
    DefaultMediaPlayerFactory
    Default implementation of the MediaPlayerFactory interface.
    GameController
    Handles game logic and acts as an intermediary between the GUI and the game board.
    GameOverPanel
    A simple JavaFX BorderPane that displays a "GAME OVER" message.
    GuiController
    Controller for the main game GUI, handling user input, game display, and interactions.
    LeaderboardController
    Controller for the leaderboard view.
    MainMenu
    Controller for the main menu of the Tetris JFX application.
    MediaPlayerFactory
    An interface for a factory that creates JavaFX Media and MediaPlayer objects.
    PreviewPanelManager
    Manages the display of next brick previews and the held brick in the UI.
    SettingsController
    Controller for the settings view, managing audio settings (volume, mute) and navigation to controls.
    TileStyleUtility
    Utility class for applying CSS styles to Rectangle objects representing game tiles.
